name: Energy Saver Home Loan Program
description: Low interest loans for income-qualified MA residents for energy efficiency improvements that reduce energy use by at least 20%.

name: EcoHome Payment Plan
description: Up to $5,000 0% interest loan with on-bill financing.

financial_authority.description: San José’s local, not-for-profit electricity supplier operated by the City of San José.
financial_authority.name: San Jose Clean Energy

name: On-Bill Recovery Loan
description: The On-Bill Recovery Loan allows homeowners to finance energy efficiency improvements and repay the loan through their utility bill.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo de Recuperación en la Factura permite a los propietarios financiar mejoras de eficiencia energética y reembolsar el préstamo a través de su factura de servicios públicos.

financial_authority.description: NYSERDA offers financing options to help New York State residents make energy efficiency improvements to their homes.
financial_authority.name: New York State Energy Research and Development Authority (NYSERDA)

name: Mass Save HEAT Loan Program
description: The HEAT Loan Program provides 0% interest loans to help Massachusetts residents finance energy-efficient home improvements, including heating, cooling, and weatherization projects.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos HEAT ofrece préstamos con 0% de interés para ayudar a los residentes de Massachusetts a financiar mejoras energéticas en el hogar, incluidos proyectos de calefacción, refrigeración y climatización.

financial_authority.description: Mass Save is a collaborative of Massachusetts' natural gas and electric utilities and energy efficiency service providers that offers the HEAT Loan Program to help residents improve energy efficiency in their homes.
financial_authority.name: Mass Save

name: Smart-E Loans
description: A Smart-E Loan can be used for over 70 home energy and resiliency-related improvements, including insulation, windows, heat pumps, solar panels, floodproofing, plumbing and more.

description_langs.es: Un préstamo Smart-E se puede utilizar para más de 70 mejoras relacionadas con la resiliencia y la energía del hogar, incluido aislamiento, ventanas, bombas de calor, paneles solares, protección contra inundaciones, plomería y más.

financial_authority.description: Connecticut Green Bank offers Smart-E Loans to help homeowners finance energy efficiency and renewable energy projects.
financial_authority.name: Connecticut Green Bank

name: Home Energy Loan
description: The Home Energy Loan program provides financing for energy efficiency upgrades such as weatherization, heating systems, solar installations, and more.

description_langs.es: El programa de Préstamos para Energía en el Hogar ofrece financiamiento para mejoras de eficiencia energética como la climatización, sistemas de calefacción, instalaciones solares y más.

financial_authority.description: Efficiency Maine offers energy loans to help homeowners finance energy efficiency upgrades, including weatherization, heating systems, and solar installations.
financial_authority.name: Efficiency Maine

name: Home Improvement Program (HIP)
description: The Home Improvement Program (HIP) allows homeowners in Hamilton County to borrow money for home repairs or improvements at interest rates 3% below the market rate. Eligible projects include weatherization, heating and cooling systems, electrical upgrades, and more.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Mejoras para el Hogar (HIP) permite a los propietarios de viviendas en el condado de Hamilton pedir dinero prestado para reparaciones o mejoras en el hogar a tasas de interés 3% por debajo de la tasa de mercado. Los proyectos elegibles incluyen climatización, sistemas de calefacción y refrigeración, actualizaciones eléctricas y más.

financial_authority.description: Hamilton County offers the Home Improvement Program (HIP) to help homeowners finance home repairs and improvements at a reduced interest rate.
financial_authority.name: Hamilton County

name: RENU Loan
description: The RENU Loan is a residential loan program designed to help Colorado homeowners finance energy efficiency and renewable energy improvements, including solar, heat pumps, energy storage, and other clean energy projects.

description_langs.es: El préstamo RENU es un programa de préstamos residenciales diseñado para ayudar a los propietarios de viviendas de Colorado a financiar mejoras en la eficiencia energética y las energías renovables, incluidos proyectos de energía solar, bombas de calor, almacenamiento de energía y otros proyectos de energía limpia.

financial_authority.description: The Colorado Clean Energy Fund (CCEF) is a nonprofit green bank that provides financing for clean energy projects in Colorado.
financial_authority.name: Colorado Clean Energy Fund

name: Geothermal Heat Pump Systems Loan
description: This loan program helps finance the installation of geothermal heat pump systems, which provide efficient heating and cooling solutions by utilizing the earth's natural heat.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ayuda a financiar la instalación de sistemas de bombas de calor geotérmicas, que proporcionan soluciones eficientes de calefacción y refrigeración utilizando el calor natural de la tierra.

financial_authority.description: Clean Energy Credit Union offers loans for clean energy projects, including solar installations, energy-efficient heating and cooling systems, and more.
financial_authority.name: Clean Energy Credit Union

name: Home Performance Loan Program
description: The Home Performance Loan Program provides low-interest loans to help homeowners finance energy efficiency improvements such as insulation, air sealing, and HVAC upgrades.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos para el Rendimiento del Hogar ofrece préstamos a bajo interés para ayudar a los propietarios a financiar mejoras de eficiencia energética como aislamiento, sellado de aire y actualizaciones de HVAC.

financial_authority.description: Columbia Power Partners offers home performance rebates and loans to help residents improve energy efficiency in their homes.
financial_authority.name: Columbia Power Partners

name: City of Tallahassee Utilities Home Energy Loan Program
description: The City of Tallahassee Utilities Home Energy Loan Program provides loans to help residents finance energy efficiency improvements such as weatherization, HVAC systems, water heaters, and solar installations.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos de Energía para el Hogar de City of Tallahassee Utilities ofrece préstamos para ayudar a los residentes a financiar mejoras de eficiencia energética como la climatización, sistemas HVAC, calentadores de agua e instalaciones solares.

financial_authority.description: The City of Tallahassee Utilities offers home energy loans to help residents improve energy efficiency in their homes. These loans cover a variety of projects including weatherization, heating and cooling systems, water heaters, and solar installations.
financial_authority.name: City of Tallahassee Utilities

name: New Hampshire Residential Clean Energy Loan Program
description: The New Hampshire Residential Clean Energy Loan Program provides financing for energy efficiency and renewable energy projects, including heating and cooling systems, solar installations, and more.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos para Energía Limpia Residencial de New Hampshire proporciona financiamiento para proyectos de eficiencia energética y energía renovable, incluidos sistemas de calefacción y refrigeración, instalaciones solares y más.

financial_authority.description: The National Energy Improvement Fund (NEIF) offers financing for residential clean energy projects in New Hampshire, including energy efficiency and renewable energy improvements.
financial_authority.name: National Energy Improvement Fund

name: Idaho Energy Loan Program
description: The Idaho Energy Loan Program provides loans to Idaho residents for energy efficiency improvements, including weatherization, heating and cooling systems, and solar installations.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos de Energía de Idaho ofrece préstamos a los residentes de Idaho para mejoras de eficiencia energética, incluyendo climatización, sistemas de calefacción y refrigeración, e instalaciones solares.

financial_authority.description: The Idaho Governor's Office of Energy and Mineral Resources (OEMR) offers a loan program to help Idaho residents finance energy efficiency projects.
financial_authority.name: Idaho Governor's Office of Energy and Mineral Resources

name: Green Home Improvement Loan
description: This loan program helps finance a variety of green home improvements, including energy-efficient heating and cooling systems, insulation, windows, and more.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ayuda a financiar una variedad de mejoras verdes en el hogar, incluidos sistemas de calefacción y refrigeración eficientes, aislamiento, ventanas y más.

financial_authority.description: Clean Energy Credit Union offers loans for clean energy projects, including solar installations, energy-efficient heating and cooling systems, and more.
financial_authority.name: Clean Energy Credit Union

name: Smart Energy Loan
description: NYSERDA provides financing options for energy efficiency improvements, including heating, cooling, weatherization, and solar projects for New York State residents.

description_langs.es: NYSERDA ofrece opciones de financiamiento para mejoras de eficiencia energética, incluyendo calefacción, refrigeración, climatización y proyectos solares para los residentes del estado de Nueva York.

financial_authority.description: NYSERDA offers financing options to help New York State residents make energy efficiency improvements to their homes.
financial_authority.name: New York State Energy Research and Development Authority (NYSERDA)

name: BeSMART Home Loan Program
description: The BeSMART Home Loan Program provides financing for energy efficiency improvements such as insulation, HVAC systems, water heaters, and more to help homeowners reduce energy consumption and costs.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos BeSMART ofrece financiamiento para mejoras de eficiencia energética como aislamiento, sistemas HVAC, calentadores de agua y más para ayudar a los propietarios a reducir el consumo de energía y los costos.

financial_authority.description: The Maryland Department of Housing and Community Development offers the BeSMART Home Loan Program to help homeowners improve energy efficiency in their homes.
financial_authority.name: Maryland Department of Housing and Community Development

name: Energy Efficiency Home Loans
description: Energy Efficiency Home Loans in California help homeowners finance energy-saving improvements such as weatherization, heating and cooling systems, water heaters, and more.

description_langs.es: Los préstamos para la eficiencia energética en el hogar en California ayudan a los propietarios a financiar mejoras que ahorran energía, como la climatización, los sistemas de calefacción y refrigeración, los calentadores de agua y más.

financial_authority.description: GoGreen Financing offers energy efficiency home loans in California to help homeowners finance energy-saving improvements.
financial_authority.name: GoGreen Financing

name: Home Energy Loan
description: The Home Energy Loan helps Vermont homeowners finance energy efficiency improvements such as weatherization, heating and cooling systems, and more.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo de Energía para el Hogar ayuda a los propietarios de viviendas en Vermont a financiar mejoras de eficiencia energética, como la climatización, sistemas de calefacción y refrigeración, y más.

financial_authority.description: Efficiency Vermont offers the Home Energy Loan to help homeowners finance energy efficiency improvements.
financial_authority.name: Efficiency Vermont

name: Zero Percent Loan Program
description: The Zero Percent Loan Program provides interest-free loans to help residents of San Mateo County and the City of Los Banos electrify their homes with energy-efficient upgrades, including heat pump water heaters, heat pump HVAC systems, electric vehicle chargers, and more.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos al Cero Por Ciento ofrece préstamos sin intereses para ayudar a los residentes del condado de San Mateo y la ciudad de Los Banos a electrificar sus hogares con mejoras energéticamente eficientes, incluidos calentadores de agua con bomba de calor, sistemas HVAC con bomba de calor, cargadores de vehículos eléctricos y más.

financial_authority.description: Peninsula Clean Energy offers a Zero Percent Loan Program to help residents electrify their homes with energy-efficient upgrades.
financial_authority.name: Peninsula Clean Energy

name: Solar PV System Loan
description: This loan program helps finance the installation of solar photovoltaic (PV) systems, which generate electricity from sunlight to power homes.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ayuda a financiar la instalación de sistemas fotovoltaicos (PV) solares, que generan electricidad a partir de la luz solar para alimentar los hogares.

financial_authority.description: Clean Energy Credit Union offers loans for clean energy projects, including solar installations, energy-efficient heating and cooling systems, and more.
financial_authority.name: Clean Energy Credit Union
